lessons.japanese: この付近はモダンな建物が多い。
lessons.english: There are many modern buildings around here.

lessons.japanese: この付近の郵便局を教えていただけませんか。
lessons.english: I wonder if you could tell me if there is a post office in this area.

lessons.japanese: この付近に和食のお店はありますか？
lessons.english: Are there any Japanese restaurants near here?

lessons.japanese: ２５号線北方面の入り口付近にいます。
lessons.english: I'm near the on ramp to 25 north.

lessons.japanese: 今私の家の付近に住宅が続々建っている。
lessons.english: In my neighborhood, houses are now being built one after another.

lessons.japanese: 人間の体温は37度付近で上下している。
lessons.english: The temperature of the human body hovers around 37°C.
